28.eng-name: Penalty of Hunting while on Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated Hafsa:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "It is not sinful (of a Muhrim) to kill five kinds of animals, namely: the crow, the kite, the mouse, the scorpion and the rabid dog

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقْتُلُ الْمُحْرِمُ مِنَ الدَّوَابِّ
chapter.eng-name: (What kind of) animals can be killed by a Muhrim
